title: Ender's Game
author: Orson Scott Card
description: One child becomes the savior of the human race... or the harbinger of xenocide

title: All the Light We Cannot See
author: Anthony Doerr
description: Takes place during WWII; follows two kids from different perspective. One is an orphan boy, the other a blind girl...

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: The story follows an American astronaut, Mark Watney, as he becomes stranded alone on Mars and must improvise in order to survive.

title: Colony
author: Rob Grant
description: Lifetimes ago, the generation ship Willflower set out, manned by the cream of humanity, on a mission to colonize the stars. But by the 10th generation, things are starting to go badly wrong.

title: Das Kapital
author: Karl Marx
description: Set in a weird dystopian past, feudalism never ends but instead morphs into a social system based on debt slavery and privilege.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: The Alchemist follows a young Andalusian shepherd named Santiago in his journey to Egypt, after having a recurring dream of finding treasure there.

title: The Rakehells of Heaven
author: John Boyd
description: Kevin O'Hara, a lusty Irishman with the gift of the blarney, and John Adams, an Alabama boy with an evangelical streak, should never have been sent on a voyage of space exploration together - but they were and landed on ther planet Harlech where an advanced culture is governed by autonomous universities.

title: The Seven Pillars of Wisdom
author: T.E. Lawrence
description: the autobiographical account of the experiences of British soldier T. E. Lawrence ('Lawrence of Arabia'), while serving as a liaison officer with rebel forces during the Arab Revolt against the Ottoman Turks of 1916 to 1918.

title: All my friends are dead
author: Avery Monsen
description: If you/re a dinosaur, all of your friends are dead.

title: The Haunting of Hill House
author: Shirley Jackson
description: 4 strangers come to spend the summer in a reputed haunted house. Beautiful and chilling.

title: Still Life with Woodpecker
author: Tom Robbins
description: Sort of a love story that takes place inside a pack of Camel cigarettes.

title: The Art of Work
author: Jeff Goins
description: How to abandon the status quo and live a life that matters with true passion and purpose

title: Annals of the Former World
author: John McPhee
description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning view of the continent, across the 40th parallel and down through 4.6 billion years.

title: El Amor en los tiempos del colera
author: Gabriel Barcia Marquez
description: circa 1880-1930 in an unnamed Caribbean seaport city. The three main characters form a triangle of love, with the hypotneuse being the quintessential romantic, Florentino Ariza, a man whose life is dedicated to love in all its aspects.

title: One Hundred Years of Solitude
author: Gabriel Barcia Marquez
description: Good Book

title: Foucault's Pendulum
author: Umberto Eco
description: After reading too many manuscripts about occult conspiracy theories, three vanity publisher employees (Belbo, Diotallevi and Casaubon) invent their own conspiracy for fun.

title: American Gods
author: Neil Gaiman
description: Ex-con, Shadow, gets caught up in a war between the gods of the Old World and the New. /'This is a bad place for gods./'

title: Learning Code for Dummies
author: General Assembly
description: For those that dont have the time to attend a WDI in person

title: One Fish Two Fish Red Fish Blue Fish
author: Theodor Seuss Geisel
description: A freewheeling plot about a boy and a girl and the many amazing creatures they have for friends and pets

title: The Mezzanine
author: Nicholson Baker
description: An afternoon in the life of an office worker.

title: Vox
author: Nicholson Baker
description: Jim and Abby have an intimate conversation on an adult call-in party line.

title: Slaughterhouse-Five
author: Kurt Vonnegut
description: Flashbacks from the unreliable narrator who describes the stories of Billy Pilgrim, who believes himself to have been in an alien zoo and to have experienced time travel.
